::Spears::

"Sparring, practice spear throwing, sharpening my spears, pole 
vaulting, sharp shooting, stuff like that.  And once in a while, I 
watch the clouds go by and look at the shapes. Got to have time to 
dream once in a while." she smiled slightly. "yeah, dare to dream." 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> Striker also sits down, noting that Spears was becoming panicky 
again.
> 
> "Just battle training, air and ground combat, stuff like that. What 
do you do 
> for fun?" he relaxes in his chair, looking out the window at the 
view.
